page.title: 20RESEARCHERS FOR QUARRINGTON
page.content:
Researchers from{Sleaford Roman {Catholic Primary School,}under the direction of their history teacher, Mr Anthony Weldon, Deputy Head, were:- Alison Cole, Jason Cowling, Pieter de Bruin, Paul Egleston, Stephanie Freeman, Clare Gould, Matthew Harding, Craig Kinnersley, Tony Mc Cauley, Lisa Mc Laughlin, Matthew Morrissey, Daniel Parker, Emma Stodart, Abigail Titmuss.
People who helped and live or work in the area were:- Rev. Hugh Bailey, Alice Brown, Tessa Brown, Mary Bugg, Francisco Cunago, Bill Fergusson Edgar, Ray Holland, Janet Johnson, Rob Kendrick, Elaine Kinnersley, Mowbray Mountain, Tony & Pat Seymour, Brian Simmons, Maureen Tupholme, Joseph Turner, Con Webster, Lesley Weldon.
